reviewText: DVD won't play just opened it today.
No able to watch in USA its no coded for my region to view
Unable to use. DVD says wrong region. Can not use in America.
Warning! The copy we received wouldn't play in our DVD player because it is a Zone 2 disc, which means it was recorded to play in European players (Zone 1 is the United States).

Its a good DVD, but just be aware that its identical to "Holiday Heroes."  We bought both, now we have 2 of the same thing.  The only difference is that in "Snow Trouble" the characters film a safety video in between episodes.  Its pretty funny, so if you have to choose, I'd buy Snow trouble.  I think Snow trouble is for a different region (we have a region free DVD player) so check that before you buy it.
